Paragraph location: 

Content: 
This document refers to an outdated version of Graph API. Please [use the latest version.](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/graph-api/reference/v19.0/link)

2.content:
Source document: data/platform-docs-versions-english/Facebook_Graph-API/Link Endpoint.md
Paragraph location: 
	Link `/{link-id}`
	Reading
	Permissions

Content: 
### Permissions  
* Any valid access token if the link is public

3.content:
Source document: data/platform-docs-versions-english/Facebook_Graph-API/Link Endpoint.md Paragraph location: Link `/{link-id}` Reading Fields Content: ### Fields | Name | Description | Type | | --- | --- | --- | | `id` | The link ID. | `string` | | `created_time` | The time the message was published. | `datetime` | | `description` | A description of the link (appears beneath the link caption). | `string` | | `from` | The user that created the link. | [`User`](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/graph-api/reference/user) | | `icon` | A URL to the link icon that Facebook displays in Feed. | `string` | | `link` | The URL that was shared. | `string` | | `message` | The optional message from the user about this link. | `string` | | `name` | The name of the link. | `string` | | `picture` | A URL to the thumbnail image used in the link post | `string` | | `reactions`



Deprecated in v8.0+. | Reactions, LIKE, LOVE, WOW, HAHA, SORRY, ANGRY, NONE, to a link. | `string` |

4.content:

	Link `/{link-id}`
	Publishing

Content: 
## Publishing  
Please use the [Sharing documentation](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/sharing/) to publish.

5.content:
Source document: data/platform-docs-versions-english/Facebook_Graph-API/Link Endpoint.md
Paragraph location: 
	Link `/{link-id}`
	Updating

Content: 
## Updating  
You can't update a link using the Graph API.

6.content:
Source document: data/platform-docs-versions-english/Facebook_Graph-API/Link Endpoint.md
Paragraph location: 
	Link `/{link-id}`
	Edges

Content: 
## Edges  
| Name | Description |
| --- | --- |
| [`/likes`](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/graph-api/reference/object/likes) | People who like this link. |
| [`/comments`](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/graph-api/reference/object/comments) | Comments on this link. |
